name: quadratic-core
description: This contains the Rust code for the quadraticCore web worker via WASM.

scripts.start: cargo watch -s 'CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-core --weak-refs'
scripts.performance: cargo watch -s 'CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-core --weak-refs'
scripts.export_types: CC=clang AR=llvm-ar cargo run --bin export_types --features js --target-dir=target/quadratic-core-types
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:clean && npm run coverage:wasm:gen && npm run coverage:wasm:html && npm run coverage:wasm:view
scripts.types: cargo watch -x 'CC=clang AR=llvm-ar run --features js --bin export_types --target-dir=target/quadratic-core-types'
scripts.clean: cargo clean && npx rimraf node_modules dist build target
